job.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer - C /C++ / Linux
job.description:
We are a disruptive medical device startup that is revolutionizing the way that the world thinks about diagnostics! We value our relaxed and fun company culture, and we're looking for someone who isn't solely money motivated; but instead sees the true potential of a stable, VC-funded (50M) company that has been in business for 10+ years!
What's In It for You
Competitive pay with incentive opportunities
Medical Insurance (Cost is 99% covered for employees)
Dental, Vision (Cost is 100% covered for employees)
Performance Bonus (2% - 10%)
Opportunity to work in a relaxed/flexible work environment!
What You Need for this Position
Experience as a Senior Embedded Software Engineer
Embedded system development experience
Strong C and C++ skills
Linux programming
Proficient with version control systems, preferably Git
Experience in the medical device industry or interest in it
Experience with Python (Preferred)
Knowledge of ISO13485 and IEC62304 (Plus)
Working knowledge of Bitbake/Yocto ecosystem (Plus)
Experience working in a lab with oscilloscopes, DMMs, power supplies, and logic analyzers (Plus)
What You Will Be Doing
Use C and C++ programming languages to develop high quality, easily maintainable production code
Improve existing devices interfaces, both internal and external
Explore and experiment with new methodologies for existing features and interfaces
Assist in the development of software architecture and high-level design choices
Assist in the selection of technical standards, tools, and platforms
Execute unit and integration tests and generate unit and integration test reports
Lead, define, and improve software development methodologies, processes, procedures, and tools
Work closely with hardware and hardware engineers, bringing up boards, interpreting data sheets and schematics, and developing device drivers
Participate in code reviews across languages and job functions
Gather requirements and write specification documents
Develop custom applications to support biology and device R&D projects
So, if you have the experience above, please apply today or email me directly at edwin.ocampo@cybercoders.com!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Edwin.Ocampo@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : EO1-1633875 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Edwin Ocampo - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
